statements: UPDATE risk_analysis SET risk_factor='High', market_trend='Bullish', claim_pattern='Stable' WHERE policy_id=101;
UPDATE risk_analysis SET market_trend='Bearish', risk_factor='Low', claim_pattern='Increasing' WHERE policy_id=102;
UPDATE risk_analysis SET risk_factor = 'High', market_trend = 'Up' WHERE policy_id = 100
UPDATE risk_analysis SET claim_pattern = 'Moderate', risk_factor = 'Low' WHERE policy_id = 200
UPDATE risk_factors SET value = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE claim_patterns SET claim_amount = 1500.00, claim_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE customer_id = 100;
UPDATE risk_factors SET type = 'Health' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE claim_patterns SET claim_amount = 500, claim_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE RiskFactors SET factor_description = 'New Description' WHERE factor_id = 1;
UPDATE ClaimPatterns SET claim_status = 'Approved', claim_amount = 5000.00 WHERE policy_number = 'ABC123';
UPDATE RiskFactors SET factor_description = 'Updated description' WHERE factor_id = 1
UPDATE ClaimPatterns SET claim_status = 'Denied', claim_amount = 5000.00 WHERE policy_number = 'P00123'
UPDATE RiskFactors SET risk_factor_description = 'Updated risk factor description' WHERE risk_factor_id = 1;
UPDATE ClaimPatterns SET claim_amount = 5000 WHERE claim_id = 100;
UPDATE insurance_claim SET claim_amount = 1500 WHERE claim_id = 1;
UPDATE customer SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 2;
